title: Deployment
description: Publishing and distributing .NET applications as framework-dependent or self-contained deployments. Options include single-file publishing, ReadyToRun compilation, and Native AOT for ahead-of-time compilation. Use `dotnet publish` with appropriate runtime identifiers (RIDs) for cross-platform targeting.
shortDescription: Publish apps: single-file, ReadyToRun, Native AOT, and cross-platform.
